name: Set of 3 French Apothecary Jars 100% Soy Wax Candles -Pink
description:
A gorgeous set of 3 French Apothecary Jars (small, medium & large) filled with only 100% Natural Soy Wax (no additives), a cotton wick, and Vegetable based dyes, all sourced from within Australia.
Our fragrances are also sourced from local Australian Supplier and you can be sure they are also of high quality, free from phthalate.

This is a gorgeous mood setting set of candles that is perfect for any size room!

Choose from the range of scents available in the drop down menu and be sure to keep an eye out for new scents to be available soon.

Small: 8.5cm x 6cm
Medium: 11cm x 9cm
Large: 14cm x 10cm 
(all measurements are without the lid).

name: Signature Candle: French Apothecary Jar - J'adore
description:
This is the signature scent of 'Isabelle Jayde Designs' as it has been my favourite perfume for the last 10 years. This candle is truly divine and fills any room with its elegant scent.

Based on the popular perfume by Christian Dior, Jâ€™adore is a modern, glamorous and feminine fragrance. It is sweet but balmy, slightly sharp floral with fresh mandarin in the top; jasmine, plum, orchid and rose in the heart; and amaranth, musk and blackberry in the trail.

If I had to imagine what heaven smelt like... It would be this candle!
A must have for any J'adore lover!

270g/370mL candle.
Jar size: 11cm x 9cm
Burn time: 60+ hours

name: 10x Small Heart Shape Soy Melts
description:
Beautiful set of 10 heart shape Soy Melts in a mixture of pink and white made from 100% Natural Soy Wax (no additives), and vegetable based dyes, all sourced from within Australia.
Our fragrances are also sourced from a local Australian Supplier and you can be sure they are also of high quality, free from phthalate.
The white colour of the candle is the natural colour of the wax.

These are perfect to be used in any oil burner with the aide of an unscented Tea Light candle. 

Soy Melt measures: 2cm x 2.5cm approximately.
Burn Time: 9+ hours 

Choose from the range of scents available in the drop down menu and be sure to keep an eye out for new scents to be available soon.

Soy Melts are also available in a Gift Pack which includes and Oil Burner, Tea Light Pack and a box of Soy Melts.

name: 48 pack of Soy Melts -Gift Box.
description:
This box contains 48 individual soy melts in the scent of your choice. You may choose up to 8 different scents, giving you 6 melts in each scent. Please leave a note in the comments section at the checkout with your choices.
Please note, these comes in groups of 6, keep that in mind when selecting your scents.

Comes in a beautiful gift box!

name: 100% Soy Wax Tealight Candles -Unscented
description:
Set of 6 Tea Light candles made from 100% Natural Soy Wax (no additives) and a cotton wick, both sourced from within Australia.

The colour of the candle is the natural colour of the wax and is completely unscented.

These are perfect to be used in any oil burner or to set the mood in any room. Perfect around the bathtub!

Tea Light measures: 1.8cm x 3.8cm
Burn Time: 5+ hours.

Choose from the range of scents available in the drop down menu and be sure to keep an eye out for new scents to be available soon.

name: Gift Pack: Oil Burner, Soy Melts and Tea Light Candles.
description:
Beautiful gift pack that includes an Oil Burner, a set of 6 unscented Tea Light candles and a pack of 10 heart shape Soy melts in the scent of your choice. 
Heart melts come in a misture of pink and white and oil burner may vary slightly than the one pictured, however it will always be white.

Tea Light candles and Soy Melts are both made from 100% natural Soy Wax with no additives and quality fragrance that is phthalate free, all sourced from local Australian suppliers.

Perfect gift for someone special or to spoil yourself!
